|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FVSG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM6GE16EWXD-12H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 78:A3:51 |oui = 78:A3:51

|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, (57600 8N1),, J4 |jtag = yes

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/23/2018 |estreldate = 2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7603EN;MT7603EN, 1715-BMJL, CTPC3Y30; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ZBT-WE1326 V02" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
A Family Models Letter at the FCC claims that the following model names all use the same circuit and RF module. :ZBT-WE1326, ZBT-WE1026-5G,ZBT-WE3526, ZBT-WE826-Q, ZBT-APG521, :ZBT-APG721, ZBT-WE4626, ZBT-APG621, ZBT-WE4726, ZBT-WD223
===Hardware=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz Dual Core *Flash: SPI 16MB (max 32MB)/NAND (no populated) *RAM: DDR3 512MB (max 512MB)| HW:V5 DDR3 256MB
===Product features=== :♦ Support 802.11abgn/ac network protocol (2.4/5 GHz) :: max transmission rate could be 1200Mbps (300+867 Mbps) :♦ 5x 10/100/1000Mbps (Auto MDI/MDIX), support 802.3u protocol, :♦ 1x USB 2.0 ports, 1x Micro SD Card Slot, 1x SIM Card slot :♦ Supports 3G/4G (an option, w/o Mini PCIe 3G/4G module), :♦ 802.11ac dual band (an option, w/o Mini PCIe 5GHz module) :♦ The HW version V5 has only 256MB memory
'''Note''': There are NO HEATSINKS installed by default, :PCB photo with heatsinks below is a MODDED state. {{see also|ZBT WG3526|ZBT WG2626}}
==Links of Interest== [https://www.alibaba.com/product-detail/zbt-we1326-MT7621-dual-band-4G_60643378529.html Alibaba page]
